videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: What is happening to this channel
videos.description:
I will be away until July 14th, and when I come back I will record Standard MTG gameplay again. Until then, enjoy some sponsored Hearthstone content and Worst Possible Live content. Members will get some extra juicy stuff that won't be made public...ever...probably.

Sponsors
